title: Add Secure Payment section before Registration Form

requirements.text: Create a new 'Secure Payment' section component and insert it in App.tsx immediately before the RegistrationForm section. The section must display: (1) a heading 'Secure Payment', (2) the text 'Pay the entry fee to the following UPI ID to participate: 8728872927@fam', (3) a 'Copy ID' button that copies '8728872927@fam' to the clipboard and shows a brief confirmation feedback (e.g., text changes to 'Copied!'), and (4) a note reading 'Please keep the transaction screenshot ready for the form'. The section background should use a slightly red tint (e.g., a dark red overlay or bg color like #1a0505 or rgba(229,62,62,0.10)) consistent with the existing red/black Free Fire theme. Style with bold Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts, sharp angular design elements, and red accent borders/highlights matching the site's existing aesthetic.

quotes: Add a new section before the registration form titled 'Secure Payment'.
Text: 'Pay the entry fee to the following UPI ID to participate: 8728872927@fam'.
Include a 'Copy ID' button and a note saying 'Please keep the transaction screenshot ready for the form'.
Make the background slightly red to match the Free Fire theme.

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Secure Payment' section appears on the page directly above the Registration Form section.
The section displays the heading 'Secure Payment'.
The UPI ID text 'Pay the entry fee to the following UPI ID to participate: 8728872927@fam' is visible.
A 'Copy ID' button is present; clicking it copies '8728872927@fam' to the clipboard.
After clicking 'Copy ID', the button text briefly changes to 'Copied!' as feedback.
The note 'Please keep the transaction screenshot ready for the form' is displayed beneath the UPI ID.
The section background uses a slightly red tint (dark red) consistent with the Free Fire red/black theme.
The section is fully mobile-responsive and matches the existing site typography and styling conventions.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/.
The new section must be inserted before RegistrationForm in App.tsx, not after.
UPI ID value must be exactly '8728872927@fam' — do not alter it.
nonGoals: No backend changes required — this is a purely frontend UI section.
No payment gateway integration or transaction verification logic.
No screenshot upload functionality in this requirement.
